channel.description: Recent content in Shooter on Game Vibe

item.title: BioMenace Remastered
item.description: Game Description BioMenace Remastered is a reimagining of the classic 2D platformer, the gameplay of which is based on dynamic shootouts and exploration of multi-level locations. The storyline takes place in the metropolis of Metro City, which was attacked by mutated creatures. The central figure of the story is secret operative Snake Logan, whose intelligence mission fails. After a plane crash, he must single-handedly confront hordes of monsters and find the source of their appearance.

item.title: Terminator 2D: NO FATE
item.description: Game Description Terminator 2D: NO FATE is an arcade action game, the plot of which is based on the events of the cult sci-fi action film, offering to relive iconic episodes in a 2D side-scroller format. Gamers take control of characters such as Sarah Connor and T-800, who will have to thwart the plans of Skynet’s artificial intelligence. The main enemy is the invulnerable T-1000, and the main task is to prevent the total destruction of humanity in the coming war.

item.title: NeverAwake FLASHBACK
item.description: Game Description Delving into the surreal world of subconscious nightmares, NeverAwake FLASHBACK offers a confrontation with distorted childhood memories. The project’s universe is filled with grotesque opponents, which are materialized phobias. The monsters are not demons, but hated vegetables, frightening dentists and other traumatic images from the past of the young heroine named Rem. On this dangerous journey through the recesses of consciousness, she is accompanied by her faithful plush companion Gabe-chan.

item.title: HELL OF FEAR: Mind Breach
item.description: Game Description HELL OF FEAR: Mind Breach is a sci-fi project with horror elements, where the main task is to preserve life in the oppressive environment of an underground scientific center on a distant planet. Exploration of this large-scale facility, consisting of 26 separate compartments, requires extreme caution, as any area contains lethal threats and hidden secrets. The chances of survival are determined by careful management of supplies and careful tactics in confrontations with the monstrous creatures generated by the complex.

item.title: FEROCIOUS
item.description: Game Description FEROCIOUS is an atmospheric adventure in a lost prehistoric world inhabited by dangerous dinosaurs. The main character learns a story about sea monsters and missing sailors who visit the mysterious fog over the Pacific Ocean. There is a distress signal from a group of investigative journalists that lead the protagonist to the territory of a tropical island located among a foggy cloud. The hero will make his way through the jungle, facing large and predatory monsters.

item.title: Mechanical Fury - Prologue
item.description: Game Description Mechanical Fury - Prologue is a fast-paced shooter, the plot of which is built around revenge on the sinister Doctor Adrian. The story begins with the protagonist losing his arm, in place of which the antagonist installs a multifunctional grappling hook. Now the protagonist, with the support of his girlfriend, will have to thwart the villain’s plans to activate the Second Armageddon. To do this, it is necessary to completely eliminate his army of machines scattered throughout the Forbidden Island.

item.title: Hail to the Rainbow
item.description: Game Description Hail to the Rainbow puts users in the shoes of Ignat, a young man navigating the harsh post-apocalyptic world of cyberpunk Russia. Having grown up alone after losing his parents, Ignat knows what he needs to do to survive. His life in this grim reality becomes routine until an unexpected email changes everything, sending him down a path of uncertainty and discovery. In an environment where survival is key, the title invites gamers to explore a chaotic world, piecing together its fragments and uncovering secrets hidden in the ruins of the past.

item.title: Brotherhood
item.description: Game Description Brotherhood is a first-person shooter game about escaping from a secret scientific facility. The main character is an experimental subject whose body turned out to be immune to a dangerous mutagen. This substance not only did not harm him, but also endowed him with almost invulnerability, turning into a source of strength. The protagonist will have to fight his way to freedom through the dark corridors of an ancient prison located in the mountains of Switzerland.

item.title: Slyders
item.description: Game Description Slyders is about going from newbie to god of destruction in short 15-minute runs where you have to go it alone against insane hordes of demons. The battlefield is rapidly filled with a barrage of shells, transforming what is happening into a real hell of bullets across vast locations. To survive in the epicenter of this chaos, you need to wisely use an extensive system of improvements, combining dozens of active and passive abilities.

item.title: Uktena 64 - Ultimate
item.description: Game Description Uktena 64 - Ultimate is a dark comedy horror game with visuals inspired by the aesthetics of the N64 console. The core of the gameplay is to track and eliminate infected fauna that are spreading an unknown deadly virus. The project offers a choice of several difficulty levels, from extremely simple to almost unbalanced. To diversify the passage, a system of unlockable cheat codes is provided that allows you to radically change the established rules.

item.title: Cleared Hot
item.description: Game Description Cleared Hot is an arcade helicopter shooter in which the laws of physics become the main weapon in the hands of the pilot. The story follows a combat veteran who, after leaving the army, lives a secluded life in a Texas trailer. Having received an old helicopter at his disposal, he returns to the sky again, where he will face numerous opponents. The combat vehicle is equipped not only with machine guns and missiles, but also with a unique cable and magnet system that allows you to interact with the environment.

item.title: Morphos
item.description: Game Description Morphos is a psychological horror in which the line between reality and madness is blurred within the walls of a mysterious scientific complex. Exploring the dark underground corridors involves solving numerous puzzles and confronting anomalous phenomena. The space around is constantly changing, turning into intricate labyrinths and distorting the usual perception. Survival will require stealthy movement, competent management of resources and the use of various types of weapons for self-defense from monsters.

item.title: WAR RATS: The Rat em Up
item.description: Game Description WAR RATS: The Rat em Up depicts the Great Rat War, plunging gamers into conflict with armies of TechnoRats. In this world inhabited exclusively by rats, the TechnoRat entity, a unified consciousness of cyborg rodents, seeks to consume all organic matter and turn it into metal structures. The gameplay features side-scrolling combat where you must fight alongside hired troops to reclaim the land of Ratopia. The task is to push back enemy forces and seize a bridgehead at the enemy base.

item.title: Brush Burial: Gutter World
item.description: Game Description Brush Burial: Gutter World is a dark, immersive simulator that revolves around completing missions across four carefully crafted and interconnected locations. The narrative structure offers one Great Contract and three Minor Contracts, encouraging repeated exploration of levels to experiment with tactics to eliminate opponents. Successfully completing challenges and progressing unlocks access to dozens of unique cosmetic items, including unique outfits for the main character, which significantly increases the replayability of the project.

item.title: Long Drive North: Co-Op RV Simulator
item.description: Game Description Long Drive North: Co-Op RV Simulator is a brutal survival test where an old RV becomes the only refuge in the world after an unknown disaster. This vehicle requires constant attention, forcing gamers to personally repair it, search for spare parts in abandoned buildings and refuel the tank to continue driving. Every bolt found and engine fixed gives a temporary sense of security in the middle of the deserted American wilderness.

item.title: Sektori
item.description: Game Description Sektori is an intense twin-stick shooter whose gameplay is inextricably linked to the aggressive rhythms of techno music and requires extreme concentration from the player. The project immerses you in a state of flow, where kaleidoscopic visuals, soundtrack and gameplay merge into one. The main task is to destroy a myriad of opponents in a constantly transforming arena. The battlefield dynamically changes its shape, expanding, contracting or even splitting into several parts, which forces you to constantly adapt battle tactics and does not allow you to rely on memorized patterns.

item.title: Void Miner – Incremental Asteroids Roguelite
item.description: Game Description Void Miner – Incremental Asteroids Roguelite, a retro-stylized roguelike shooter that immerses you in the atmosphere of classic arcade games and invites you to take control of a spaceship to clear endless asteroid fields. The main task is to methodically destroy waves of space debris filling hostile space. Gamers will have to not only dodge countless threats, but also conduct targeted fire, turning chaotic clusters into valuable resources for further development.

item.title: VORON: Raven's Story
item.description: Game Description VORON: Raven’s Story tells an emotional story about life and death from an unusual perspective. The main character is a raven who is destined to become a guide to lost souls, helping them find their way to a new world. Starting his journey as a chick, he gradually turns into a mythical creature from ancient legends. However, his very first mission turns into disaster when an ancient evil awakens, disrupting the established order.

item.title: Skopje '83
item.description: Game Description Skopje ‘83 is a tactical shooter with a comic book visual style, immersing you in the dark atmosphere of an alternative history of the Balkans. The only island of relative safety in a city engulfed in chaos is the DOM bus. This mobile base not only serves as a means of navigating dangerous streets, but also as a workshop for upgrading your equipment. Inside it, you can modify your character and save valuable loot collected during forays.

item.title: The Last Caretaker
item.description: Game Description The Last Caretaker is a story of survival in a world where hostile mechanisms and a constant lack of resources force you to act methodically. The gameplay is based on the exploration of abandoned structures towering over the endless ocean. Each rusty tower or silent dock becomes a source of valuable materials obtained by dismantling the remains of a former civilization. Not only tools and weapons are created from the recovered scrap, but also complex energy networks.

item.title: PLAGUN – The Plague Goes On
item.description: Game Description PLAGUN – The Plague Goes On is a dark world of a fallen kingdom, destroyed by a failed immortality vaccine and turned into an arena for survival. Instead of healing, civilization received an endless plague that gave birth to regenerating horrors. In this setting, a former doctor, now a monster in a mask, will have to fight back the endless hordes of the infected. His task is not just to survive, but also to uncover the dark secret behind the disaster that destroyed everything around him.

item.title: Rubble Eats The World
item.description: Game Description Rubble Eats The World is a shooter with an advanced physics model, where almost any object on the level is subject to destruction and subsequent absorption. After completing the main story campaign, additional opportunities open up for gamers. The built-in sandbox editor allows you to design your own testing grounds and share them with other players. For those looking for a real challenge, there is a difficulty setting system.

item.title: 7th Floor
item.description: Game Description 7th Floor plunges you into an atmosphere of despair where survival requires constant adaptation. Confrontation with terrible monsters gives way to the need to hide from the inexorable doctor who is hot on the hero’s heels. The gameplay is divided into sections, combining horror and action elements. All events unfold from the first person, which enhances the effect of presence and forces you to carefully examine the environment in search of useful objects and clues.

item.title: Echoes of the Living
item.description: Game Description Echoes of the Living is a chilling classic survival horror game that will keep you on the edge of your seat! Taking inspiration from the greatest hits of the 90s, this game takes horror to a whole new level. You will be completely immersed in a dark and frightening world, filled with unspeakable horrors and secrets that have yet to be revealed. As you explore a small town located in northern Europe, you quickly realize that something is wrong.

item.title: Silver Bullet
item.description: Game Description Silver Bullet is an arcade shooting gallery in which the protagonist will have to clear static screens from numerous waves of enemies. The famous monster hunter Van Helsing falls under the control of the gamer, who will have to go through 12 levels. The gameplay requires precise actions, since simultaneous movement and firing are not provided. To survive, you must constantly evade threats and choose the right position to attack.

item.title: The Outer Worlds 2
item.description: Game Description The Outer Worlds 2 invites users to go to the Arcadia colony, where a new series of tests awaits them. This world is on the brink of destruction when mysterious rifts begin to open, threatening not only the colony, but the entire galaxy. Taking the place of an experienced agent of the Earth Directorate, gamers will find themselves in the center of a large-scale conflict, the decisions of which will directly affect the fate of Arcadia and the whole world.

item.title: Silly Polly Beast
item.description: Game Description Silly Polly Beast is a dive into a nightmarish and often abstract underground world shrouded in a deadly fog. In this ominous dimension, the main character will have to adapt to cruel rules in order to survive. A special bracelet serves as the only indicator of danger, lighting up red when approaching a destructive haze. You can move around creepy locations not only on foot, but also with the help of a skateboard, which is also used as a weapon for close combat.

item.title: Beneath
item.description: Game Description Beneath is a dive into the chilling depths of the ocean, where experienced diver Noah Quinn must face the horrors generated by sinister experiments. In the cramped corridors of underwater research stations, a desperate struggle for survival unfolds. Ammunition is running low, and you have to confront not only the ruthless mercenaries of the Omnium corporation, but also the nightmarish Lovecraftian creatures that have awakened in the Arctic abyss.

item.title: BoneField: Bodycam Horror
item.description: Game Description BoneField Bodycam Horror is a story in which the only way to see supernatural creatures is through the use of a special ghost light. This tool allows you not only to illuminate the space, but also to expose paranormal entities hidden from the naked eye. Each flash of this mystical light can reveal a threat lurking in the darkness, turning exploration of locations into a tense confrontation with the unknown.

item.title: MISERY
item.description: Game Description MISERY throws up to 15 players into a cooperative survival scenario in a nuclear disaster zone. The characters take on the roles of PMCs guarding a research institute in the Republic of Zaslavie before the conflict escalated into nuclear war. A siren sounds, signaling an incoming bomb and providing a 60-second window to grab supplies before retreating to the bunker. After the strike, the daily routine consists of forays into the procedurally generated Exclusion Zone to collect resources from ruined cities and abandoned military bases.

item.title: Onirism
item.description: Game Description Onirism features a young girl named Carol as the main character. She is full of energy, but at the same time absolutely disciplined. One day, a strange portal materializes next to her bed, from which creatures of unknown origin appear. They take the plush toy, hiding on the other side of the portal. Without the slightest hesitation, the heroine follows them, intending to return what was taken from her.

item.title: FULL METAL SCHOOLGIRL
item.description: Game Description FULL METAL SCHOOLGIRL is a satirical depiction of the future, where two cybernetically enhanced schoolgirls must storm the hundred-story skyscraper of a giant corporation. Inside a building whose structure changes with each new entry, the heroines Akemi and Ryoko are confronted by legions of corporate slaves turned into cyborgs. These weak-willed fighters, known as the Working Dead, defend their employer’s interests to the last spark of life, attacking in waves and relying on numerical superiority.

item.title: Painted In Blood
item.description: Game Description Painted In Blood is a dive into the depths of a distorted consciousness, where reality is deformed under the influence of the actions and mental state of the protagonist. In this surreal first-person shooter, the world is a mad artist’s nightmare, constantly changing and reacting to every action. Gameplay is directly dependent on a unique sanity system that forces the player to balance on the brink of madness, as visual effects and even the opponents themselves transform in real time.

item.title: Species: Unknown
item.description: Game Description Species Unknown is a dark sci-fi adventure in which mercenaries must face horror aboard abandoned spaceships. An unpredictable threat lurks within the depths of these wrecked ships, forcing squads of up to four to work together to survive. Each task plunges you into an atmosphere of oppressive uncertainty, because the hunt is led by one of five deadly entities with unique habits and strengths. Successful completion of the contract depends on the team’s ability to adapt and use the tools available to confront the nightmare that lurks in the darkness.

item.title: Tormented Souls 2
item.description: Game Description Tormented Souls 2 continues the story of Caroline Walker after the events at Wildberger Asylum. Her little sister, Anna, suffers from visions of violence and death, which she sketches, and these drawings become reality. To save her sister, the heroine travels to the remote town of Villa Hess and a secluded clinic in the mountains of southern Chile. The establishment’s employees hide behind a mask of calm, but soon the sisters find themselves in the center of a completely new nightmare.

item.title: Painkiller
item.description: Game Description Painkiller is a dark reimagining of the classic shooter where four characters are given a chance at redemption. Under the control of the gamer, one of the heroes, be it Ink, Void, Sol or Roch, must stop the invasion of Earth organized by the fallen angel Azazel. The journey will take them to Purgatory, where they will face hordes of demons and monstrous creatures of darkness known as the Nephilim.

item.title: SWAPMEAT
item.description: Game Description SWAPMEAT is a co-op roguelite shooter set on the strangest and most hostile planets in the galaxy. In this project, players will have to carry out raids on alien worlds inhabited by aggressive alien creatures in order to collect their flesh. A central mechanic is the ability to instantly replace your character’s body parts with organs borrowed from defeated enemies. This approach allows you to constantly adapt to the combat situation, adopting the unique abilities of your opponents right during the battle.

item.title: Night Jackal: Blood Debt
item.description: Game Description Night Jackal Blood Debt follows a masked vigilante whose sanity is on edge after a brutal attack on his estate shatters his way of life. Taking on the guise of the Night Jackal, this anti-hero, driven by the desire for retribution, begins his crusade on the streets of the city. Justice is restored to them using their own, often brutal, methods, and the story itself explores the development of a superhero who gradually loses control in attempts to take revenge for the past.

item.title: Swamp Keeper
item.description: Game Description Swamp Keeper is a tale about a little keeper who is destined to protect a sacred swamp from the encroachments of invaders. Armed only with a bow, this nimble lizard must repel the onslaught of the enemy army of Ho, seeking to seize the valuable resources of the swamps. The fate of the native lands depends on accuracy and tactical calculation, because the enemy, using iron and fire, has already approached the very heart of the swamp sanctuary.

item.title: Melted Valor
item.description: Game Description Melted Valor is a desperate struggle for survival, unfolding in the vastness of an ordinary residential area that has turned into a field of all-out war. Under the command of the player are the Green Forces, whose peaceful days are in the past. Now they must defend their homes and friends from a ruthless threat known as the Tang Menace. The enemy does not hesitate to use the dirtiest methods to achieve his goals, turning the familiar world into a war zone.

item.title: Alien: Rogue Incursion Evolved Edition
item.description: Game Description In Alien: Rogue Incursion Evolved Edition, a distress call brings retired Colonial Marine Zula Hendricks to the remote planet Purdan. Her investigation uncovers a secret Weyland-Yutani complex that has been completely overrun by deadly creatures. The gloomy corridors of the station become a battlefield for survival. This title is the first chapter of a duology, the events of which take place between the first two films of the franchise.

item.title: Mamorukun ReCurse!
item.description: Game Description In Mamorukun ReCurse! the summoned souls, together with the main character, end up in the mysterious Underworld. A local priestess reports that the opening gates to the Dark Dimension are sending a curse on the inhabitants of this kingdom. The assembled characters are tasked with cleaning up the locals to prevent disaster. Joining forces is their only chance to return home, which sends the heroes on a journey through a strange land full of possessed enemies.

item.title: Slime Rancher 2
item.description: Game Description Slime Rancher 2 continues the adventure of Beatrix LeBeau, who travels to Rainbow Island, making her way through a host of obstacles to create a slug farm. The platformer with construction elements features an open world where the user is invited to encounter a mass of slimes that must be collected using a special blaster-vacuum cleaner. Here you will also discover new species of slugs, explore a mysterious world, and build a greenhouse, placing it on a paradise island.

item.title: Jump Space
item.description: Game Description Jump Space is a team-based first-person shooter game designed for teams of up to 4 people crewing one starship. The gameplay involves completing specific tasks in space. Gamers seamlessly switch between controlling the ship, exploring locations on foot, and moving outside the vehicle when entering airless space. Maintaining the operational condition and upgrading the overall starship is a key activity within the gameplay. In Jump Ship, teams will take part in combat encounters that take place both on planetary surfaces and in the vacuum of space.

item.title: Moros Protocol
item.description: Game Description Shootouts in Moros Protocol take place in a sci-fi setting where users have to face a variety of mutated monsters. The game is stylized as old-school designs drawn in pixel graphics. The gameplay is an action first-person shooter with roguelike elements. The main character is forced to confront the monsters and bandits that appeared in the universe due to the activities of two megacorporations involved in neurobiology. In the Darkverse universe, users have the opportunity to explore dark laboratory dungeons that will be formed randomly.

item.title: PIGFACE
item.description: Game Description The main character of PIGFACE, a woman named Exit, comes to her senses and discovers a bomb implanted in her head. Her past actions led to her being blackmailed into fulfilling contracts for the figures now controlling her life. Missions do not have a prescribed method of completion, allowing both rapid assaults and more tactical, slow progress. The only requirement is to complete the goal by any available means.

item.title: Antivirus PROTOCOL
item.description: Game Description Antivirus PROTOCOL opens up a digital world captured by the ubiquitous Virus, and the gamer is given the role of counter-program. The main task is the methodical extermination of hostile elements that have filled the system. The first steps involve eliminating small pests to obtain their internal components, represented by code fragments and raw data. This process of gathering resources becomes the basis for achieving the main goal - complete cleanup of the infected network.

item.title: BRAZILIAN DRUG DEALER 3
item.description: Game Description BRAZILIAN DRUG DEALER 3 is not a title for the faint of heart, because it throws users straight into a world where chaos reigns, and their main task is simple: to correct the disorder caused by an unforeseen and catastrophic ritual. The plot centers on a fan of the cult Brazilian funk musician MIT AIA, who, while trying to revive the star, accidentally opens a portal to Hell. At this point, everything takes a turn for the worse, and suddenly the entire state of Rio de Janeiro is overrun by demons and possessed creatures.

item.title: eXoSpace Combat Engineer
item.description: Game Description eXoSpace Combat Engineer is a journey into the depths of a procedurally generated galaxy, where survival depends solely on engineering savvy and piloting skill. In the role of a bounty hunter, you will have to chart a course through unexplored sectors of space, each hyperjump in which promises unpredictable events. Fate can lead you to a research station in distress, throw you into the thick of a battle with pirates, or force you to face a moral choice - to provide assistance or engage in robbery.

item.title: Ammo and Oxygen
item.description: Game Description Ammo and Oxygen sends an expedition to Voydregula 6, a planet where communication with the new colony has been completely severed. The purpose of the mission is to find out the reason for the silence and determine the fate of the settlers. Gamers will explore procedurally generated locations, moving through abandoned stations, canyons, swamps and permafrost. Each foray into these dangerous zones becomes an attempt to restore the picture of the events that led to the collapse of the settlement and to confront the hostile inhabitants.

item.title: METAL EDEN
item.description: Game Description METAL EDEN is a high-intensity sci-fi first-person shooter that puts players in the heart of an intense futuristic conflict. The story follows a special unit known as ASKA, an advanced combat android tasked with a suicide mission to extract CORE citizens from MOEBIUS. Once a beacon of hope, MOEBIUS has now become a death trap. The goal is simple - traverse a vast, desolate cityscape, battle ruthless machine enemies, and uncover the dark secrets buried in the depths of this artificial world.

item.title: Fear Effect
item.description: Game Description In Fear Effect, a trio of mercenaries - Hana, Glas and Dick - take on the risky task of finding Wi Ming Lam, the heiress of the powerful head of the Hong Kong Triad, who mysteriously disappeared on the eve of her 18th birthday. Driven by a thirst for profit, they plan to demand a substantial ransom from her influential father for the girl’s return. However, what began as a cynical criminal extortion operation quickly turns into a desperate fight for its own existence.

item.title: Supraworld
item.description: Game Description Supraworld takes a solver’s guild student on a journey through a man-made toy world. These lands suffer from storms of riddles that create obstacles for the inhabitants. To pass the final exam, the protagonist must rescue the princess from the castle. The main task can be ignored in favor of other activities in a huge, interconnected environment. The exploration of the world takes place from a miniature perspective, and each object pursues a specific gameplay goal, being devoid of unnecessary decorations.

item.title: Abyssus
item.description: Game Description Abyssus is a dynamic adventure through a world created based on the legends of Atlantis. For greater color, the buildings of the Aztecs and their temples were used to develop the architecture. The player will have to explore a vast territory, which is not very happy that its silence has been disturbed, and it is ready to call on all possible forces to help restore peace. Actions take place in the 19th century.

item.title: GRADIUS ORIGINS
item.description: Game Description GRADIUS ORIGINS is a collection of titles from the space shooter series. This collection includes 7 arcade titles from the history of the franchise, offering 18 different versions of them to play. The set includes the Salamander 3 title along with the original video game, including the Japanese, North American and European releases. Gamers also have access to numerous iterations of Salamander and Life Force, giving insight into the development of the arcade series.

item.title: Plastic Battlegrounds
item.description: Game Description Plastic Battlegrounds is a virtual reality combat simulator based on toy soldier warfare. Players construct the battlefield, deploying units, vehicles, and stationary fortifications from a growing list to create a unique tactical environment. The project offers a dual perspective, allowing the user to either directly participate in the battle as a soldier, or observe a miniature conflict in the form of a life-size figure. Tools for creating the perfect battle in Plastic Battlegrounds:

item.title: FBC: Firebreak
item.description: Game Description FBC: Firebreak gives gamers a co-op first-person shooter for 3 people, set in the headquarters of a federal agency under attack by forces from other dimensions. Acting as operatives of the Firebreak unit, the group must intervene in the most critical situations occurring within the besieged structure. This squad is required to penetrate crisis zones, restore order, contain chaos and fight to regain control over the facility. The prolonged siege had reached a critical point, requiring direct intervention in the most unstable sectors of the building.

item.title: MindsEye
item.description: Game Description MindsEye is a world where the boundaries between reality and illusion are blurred. You step into the role of Jacob Diaz, a man with a dark past that is slowly slipping away from his grasp. With a neural implant that should help him recall memories but instead leads to even more confusion, Jacob must navigate a landscape fraught with danger. The American landscape of the near future is riddled with stories of corporate deceit, political intrigue, and the ever-present shadow of artificial intelligence.

item.title: Hopeless Sea
item.description: Game Description Hopeless Sea imagines a world submerged after climate catastrophe melts the polar ice caps. A sea level rise of more than 50 meters has rendered 90 of the planet’s coastal cities uninhabitable, forcing survivors to move inland to escape powerful storms. Soon, a new threat emerged from the ocean depths - mutated aggressive sea creatures that began to attack the last strongholds of people. To save civilization, a final mission is sent to the sea to find the source of the creatures and eliminate the root cause of the disaster.

item.title: Scope X
item.description: Game Description Scope X provides the ability to zoom in real time to any selected area of ​​the computer screen, serving as a tool for improving visual access. This lightweight software is designed to improve image clarity for PC gamers and other users across the entire display area. Its central goal is to instantly zoom into specific areas, revealing important details in any active game, without interrupting the process. The utility operates through an overlay, allowing it to work independently of the running software and enlarging the image directly from the monitor.

item.title: DecayZ Origin
item.description: Game Description Decayz Origin is the story of a desperate struggle for life in a world that was destroyed by a viral disaster. In the center of the story is a man whose only goal is to save his loved one from a deadly infection, which makes him go to the very heart of the epidemic. The journey of the protagonist runs through the ruins of civilization, where terrifying mutations and traces of the former tragedy await at every step.

item.title: Project Warlock 2
item.description: Game Description Among the fiery battles of Project Warlock 2, there is a rational grain - the confrontation between the forces of light and darkness. In a world full of vile creatures, the main character learned the art of magic from his mentor. But waking up in an abandoned castle, the protagonist discovers that his teacher has disappeared without a trace, and the area is literally infested with monsters. Pulling himself together, Palmer reloads his staff and goes in search of his comrade, simultaneously crushing herds of brainless demonic henchmen.

item.title: Trench Tales
item.description: Game Description Trench Tales is a game project that introduces gamers to a dark alternative reality, the events of which take place between the First and Second World Wars. You take control of a lone fighter, transported to the strange dimension of Verdun by the actions of unknown forces. The story is told in third person, focusing on the action in this dysfunctional environment with elements of horror and dark fantasy.

item.title: Vietnam War
item.description: Game Description Vietnam War offers a single-player, open-world, first-person immersion experience set against the backdrop of a historical conflict. Gamers choose sides: the forces of the United States or the Viet Cong fighters of the North Vietnamese Army, operating in a variety of landscapes. This project includes squad management mechanics that allow you to lead soldiers in combat situations. In addition, there are other units on the battlefield, autonomously participating in clashes, which adds dynamics to the environment.

item.title: Lurking Danger
item.description: Game Description Lurking Danger is a survival horror gaming experience where two waitresses, Elena and Regina, become embroiled in the mystery of a regular customer’s disappearance. Their investigation quickly moves into an altered reality, where familiar places are distorted and familiar logic ceases to work. Gamers will have to face a hostile environment alone or using local co-op in split screen. The key goal is to locate the missing person while simultaneously dealing with threats to the transformed reality.

item.title: Drive Beyond Horizons
item.description: Game Description Drive Beyond Horizons abandons the linear path and throws gamers into a vast, ever-changing world. Buckle up and get ready to explore - procedurally generated landscapes make every game unique. Leave your comfort zone and choose your own route. Travel across vast deserts, lush forests, and any kind of road (or lack thereof). But this is not just a sightseeing trip. Drive Beyond Horizons is fraught with many secrets and difficulties that remain to be unraveled.

item.title: Metal Garden
item.description: Game Description Metal Garden is a first-person shooter game set in a vast megastructure overgrown with vegetation. The title follows a lone traveler navigating a setting abandoned to its original purpose. The remains of past civilizations are scattered throughout the vast and multi-layered industrial ruins. The main character will have to go through this environment, facing unknown threats and obstacles. Progress depends on exploring the terrain, discovering lost knowledge, and adapting to the dangers present in the changing landscape.

item.title: Grand Theft Auto 5 Enhanced
item.description: Game Description Grand Theft Auto 5 Enhanced is a significant update for players looking for a new experience from the already classic gameplay. Rockstar Games has turned the popular GTA 5 into a more powerful version aimed at new generation platforms. Gamers will experience improved performance across several technical parameters and significant updates to the core environment. Los Santos in GTA 5 continues to serve as the backdrop for the narrative, with the three main characters navigating complex crime landscapes.

item.title: X-Out: Resurfaced
item.description: Game Description X-Out: Resurfaced brings the legendary underwater shooter to modern platforms, inviting users to build their fleet and fight the alien forces hiding in the ocean depths. The title resurrects the challenging Rainbow Arts game, created back in the era of home computers, and now remade from the ground up thanks to the collaboration of ININ and Ziggurat. Users are immersed in eight diverse stages filled with enemies, bosses, and custom ships that create unique gameplay with each session.

item.title: Sodaman
item.description: Game Description Sodaman is a fast-paced roguelike that puts you in the shoes of a super soldier tasked with saving the universe from alien invaders. After the Sodacalypse caused by Entity-X, most sodas have turned into flat, lifeless drinks, and Sodaman must find the last remaining fizzy powers and fight them back. Gamers choose their soda powers, which come in seven colors, each with unique abilities to shake things up.

item.title: Arken Age
item.description: Game Description Arken Age is a virtual reality adventure that immerses gamers in Bio-Chasm, a world shaped by the mysterious Grand Arborist. Stepping into the shoes of a member of the Nara race, users must navigate this bizarre, terraformed environment that has been corrupted by an all-consuming force known as Hyperion’s neural corruption. Physics-based combat mechanics include both sword and gun combat, influenced by the unique properties of Arkenite, the world’s main resource.

item.title: Puropu Defense Squad
item.description: Game Description Puropu Defense Squad is a strategy action game where animate inanimate objects are forced to defend their existence from ruthless invaders from Earth. The central task for the fighters of the elite squad is the defense of the Extractor, which is the source of life for the entire Puropu civilization. Confronting aggressors requires not only direct participation in battles, but also the construction of complex defensive structures. Defenders have at their disposal an extensive arsenal of hundreds of defense mechanisms, including 15 types of traps and turrets.

item.title: The Thing: Remastered
item.description: Game Description The Thing: Remastered returns to Antarctica, continuing the story of the 1982 film. Nightdive Studios resurrects the 2002 horror third-person shooter with a sequel to Outpost 31. Players play as Captain J.F. Blake, commander of a US Special Forces rescue team sent to investigate the aftermath of a scientific expedition. Gameplay centers on facing off against shape-shifting alien creatures in a challenging environment. Team management becomes one of the core mechanics in which players must navigate complex interpersonal dynamics and potential contagion among team members.

item.title: Battle Shapers
item.description: Game Description Battle Shapers is a thrilling sci-fi roguelite first-person shooter that puts you in the shoes of Ada, a determined warrior who must reclaim the future of New Elysium from the treacherous Overlords and their corrupt robot armies. From the start of Battle Shapers, you’ll find yourself armed with a formidable array of futuristic weapons, special abilities, and even abilities stolen from the unforgiving Overlords themselves. Your task is to go through their treacherous towers, which are fraught with traps and dangers at every step.

item.title: RAM: Random Access Mayhem
item.description: Game Description RAM: Random Access Mayhem is a roguelike shooter that takes a familiar concept and turns it into something chaotic and strategic. In a world filled with bizarre robots, gamers take on the role of a disembodied AI programmed to wreak havoc. Unlike typical shooters, the adventure game features new mechanics: you control and switch between eight different types of enemies, each with their own unique abilities. This twist not only keeps the action fresh, but also requires quick thinking and strategy as you progress through increasingly difficult levels.

item.title: 420BLAZEIT 2: GAME OF THE YEAR - Dank Dreams and Goated Memes
item.description: Game Description 420BLAZEIT 2: GAME OF THE YEAR - Dank Dreams and Goated Memes is a first-person shooter that stands out for its wild premise and unpredictable gameplay. The story follows a former Secret Service agent who leaves behind a life of danger and intrigue to pursue a quieter existence as an artist. However, peace does not last long. The agent is soon forced back into action to save memes from the clutches of the Illuminati, a shadowy organization that seems intent on controlling the internet’s most valuable content.

item.title: Space Trash Scavenger
item.description: Game Description Space Trash Scavenger takes place in a future where humanity has reached for the stars and survival means using what others have left behind. Here, gamers take on the role of scavengers operating in a galaxy littered with the rubble of an ancient conflict. The journey begins with a space drill - a multi-purpose node floating among the remains of abandoned ships, forgotten outposts and asteroid fields. This is not just a shelter, but a factory, equipped with critical systems for agriculture, defense and waste processing - all necessary to turn interstellar waste into something valuable.

item.title: Sorry We're Closed
item.description: Game Description Sorry We’re Closed is a tense survival horror game inspired by the old school genre. You’ll follow the gripping story of Michelle, a young woman who finds herself cursed by a powerful demon and given only days to live. Determined to make the most of the remaining time, the heroine sets out on a journey to uncover the secrets of her city and the world of demons, while simultaneously searching for a way to lift the curse and escape.

item.title: Metal Thunder
item.description: Game Description Metal Thunder is a roguelite title where gamers take control of a powerful warship as they navigate a world filled with hostile forces. At the center is an intense air battle in which users will have to overcome waves of enemies and complete risky missions. Each mission offers a new set of challenges, requiring both tactical precision and quick reflexes to succeed. There is no room for complacency in the title, as gamers must adapt their approach on the fly to cope with ever-changing threats.

item.title: Raiden Nova
item.description: Game Description Raiden NOVA is the latest evolution of the iconic series, offering a fresh experience for fans and newcomers alike. The title immerses users in an intense 2D twin-stick shooter where dodging enemy fire becomes a priority and aiming is as important as survival. As the gameplay progresses, the task becomes clear: control the ship, dodge incoming enemies and shoot back accurately. The mechanics are based on the use of two sticks - one to move the ship and the other to aim, giving gamers complete control over movement and attack.

item.title: Rusty's Day Off: Episode One - Janitor on Duty
item.description: Game Description Rusty’s Day Off: Episode One - Janitor on Duty offers an original take on the first-person shooter (FPS) genre. The gamer will have to step into the shoes of Rusty, a janitor who is tasked with sorting out a situation at a workplace where a malfunction has occurred due to rogue robots. It’s not just running and gunning, there’s more to it than that. You’ll have to solve puzzles, interact with strange gadgets, and figure out how to stay alive while coping with mechanical chaos.

item.title: Red Dead Redemption
item.description: Game Description The beginning of the 20th century was not easy in the Wild West inRed Dead Redemption. John Marston was previously a member of a gang of thugs, but decided to end his bloody occupation. The guy did not manage to start a quiet life - the hero was taken under the “guardianship” of government services, whose agents forced him to work for them. The character’s family was under their guns, and if they refused, John’s relatives would be killed.

item.title: Forgive Me Father 2
item.description: Game Description Forgive Me Father 2, an FPS action game, takes users on a journey through their darkest nightmares in search of an opportunity to regain their sanity. Drawing inspiration from the myths of G.F. Lovecraft, where madness is ever present, the game continues the exciting story of the hero Priest from its predecessor. As players walk the fine line between sanity and madness, distinct, eerie visuals reminiscent of hand-drawn graphics create a striking and eerie atmosphere that feels like a page ripped out of a haunted comic book.

item.title: Speedollama
item.description: Game Description Speedollama is a fast-paced platform shooter that takes gamers into a world where llamas battle an army of alpacas. The unusual premise draws users into a chaotic world where humor and action collide in the most unexpected ways. The goal is simple: control a llama equipped with a mining machine and destroy waves of alpaca enemies. The title features a vibrant environment filled with quirky characters and varied challenges, making every moment exciting.

item.title: Simulakros
item.description: Game Description Simulakros is a fast-paced third-person shooter that immerses gamers in a futuristic environment dominated by robots and advanced artificial intelligence. In this game, users take on the role of a combat android, which was created by the powerful corporation CORP. The central mission is to thwart CORP’s plans by turning its own creations against it, with the assistance of a mysterious hacker whose motives remain unclear. This setup sets the stage for an exciting game filled with unexpected twists and tactical decisions.

item.title: Shady Knight
item.description: Game Description Shady Knight is a first-person hand-to-hand combat game. The environment is interactive and contains a huge amount of dynamic combat. The gameplay combines elements of platforming. You will need to go through many towers and brutally tear apart your enemies. You use a sword with which you kill your enemies. You can also kick opponents onto spikes, shoot enemies with fire, and throw swords at their bodies to pin them to walls.

item.title: Gunsmith Simulator
item.description: Game Description Gunsmith Simulator, as the name suggests, is a gunsmith simulator. It’s also a zombie shooter with a first-person view. The project may appeal to firearms lovers and those who like to shoot the living dead. The guns are highly detailed here. Gunsmith Simulator allows you to disassemble and reassemble different guns, as well as upgrade them. In this game we are repairing barrels. They are sent by various clients.

item.title: Aim Camp
item.description: Game Description Aim Camp is an adventure game that combines military simulator and interactive gameplay. It immerses gamers in a variety of training exercises aimed at honing their aiming and accuracy skills. Each exercise presents users with unique challenges, including scenarios such as close combat, sniping and drone operations. Gamers immerse themselves in these drills, where the goal is not only competition, but also a deeper understanding of accuracy. The design of each scenario encourages a focused approach, requiring players to constantly adapt and improve their techniques.

item.title: Beyond Hanwell
item.description: Game Description Beyond Hanwell takes players to a post-apocalyptic London. Westminster, once a bustling hub, now serves as the backdrop to a complex journey of survival. Anomalies, a growing threat, inhabit the ruins of Hanwell. Gamers fight them using collected weapons or gadgets from the environment. The title offers more than just survival. She is a mystery. The director, a shadow figure, holds the clues. Side missions and hidden areas enrich the narrative.

item.title: Iron Meat
item.description: Game Description Iron Meat is a dynamic platformer made in the style of arcade shooters of the last century. The game takes place on Mars, when a group of scientists disappeared from radar without a trace. The case is entrusted to a member of an elite squad who goes in search of missing people. He must find out what really happened and who is behind this mysterious event. The gameplay takes inspiration from classic action games such as Contra.

item.title: ZERO PROTOCOL
item.description: Game Description ZERO PROTOCOL throws you headlong into a chilling Antarctic research center. Beneath the ice lies a crashed alien spaceship, and you have to unravel its secrets. In this sci-fi thriller, you’ll not only have to fight your way through hordes of enemies, but also think and solve puzzles that will test your logic. Don’t expect a linear path. ZERO PROTOCOL allows you to forge your own path, and every decision can lead you down a new rabbit hole.

item.title: The Forever Winter
item.description: Game Description The Forever Winter is a tactical survival horror shooter set in a post-apocalyptic world. Gamers navigate a landscape dominated by massive war machines locked in a relentless conflict. Here, special attention is paid to strategic decision-making and cooperation: gamers extract resources and fight for survival. The dynamic collision system ensures that enemies have their own goals and react intelligently to user actions, creating an unpredictable battlefield. In The Forever Winter, users form squads to plunder the dead and confront terrifying war machines.

item.title: Cyberwar: Neon City
item.description: Game Description Cyberwar: Neon City immerses players in a neon-drenched cyberpunk world ruled by mischievous monkeys. As a brave hero armed with a weapon in the form of a living shark, you will fight against fearsome cyber-monkeys and go through various floors, each of which has unique enemies and mini-bosses. Thanks to its roguelike structure, the games will not be similar to each other. Procedurally generated levels keep the game fresh, and a huge number of items and upgrades open up endless possibilities.

item.title: Anomalous
item.description: Game Description Anomalous takes users to the fictional and totalitarian city-state of Kosolov. Local authorities were able to brainwash the population and forced residents to work until exhaustion in order to get rich at the expense of others. One day, the leaders of an industrial and closed country began to experiment on people. They decided to increase the military potential of the power and began to conduct experiments on dead workers in order to revive them and force them to perform their duties again.

item.title: Chains of Fury
item.description: Game Description Crazy shooterChains of Fury with completely destructible levels. Lost or lost in the corridors? Just destroy all the walls with a shotgun! Up to 80% of the entire location will be broken, which will give complete freedom of movement. But you can’t fight with concrete alone. Aliens robots, creepy monsters and huge bosses - all this will need to be turned into bloody stains on the concrete. The main character of “Chains of Fury” was a slightly distraught mercenary.

item.title: Hands of Necromancy 2
item.description: Game Description Hands of Necromancy 2 is a dark fantasy first-person shooter that picks up where its predecessor left off. You can play as one of two characters, each with their own special abilities and spells. The game has reworked the necromancy system, so you can use new weapons and learn powerful spells. Transformations are important, allowing you to transform into various creatures to overcome obstacles and defeat enemies. The game has many different environments: ancient castles, dry deserts, beautiful villages and creepy caves.

item.title: Hollowbody
item.description: Game Description Hollowbody throws you headlong into the dark world of techno-noir. Imagine a short story, but you control the main character as he navigates a crumbling metropolis, a ghost town of a once bustling city. Forget the fancy graphics and pumping music, this is just an environmental story. Deserted streets and abandoned buildings speak volumes, whispering about a forgotten past. You wake up in this nightmare, ill-equipped and alone. Survival depends on your intelligence.

item.title: Stardiver
item.description: Game Description The underwater world ofStardiver amazes with its diversity. Under the water column lies an entire civilization that has adapted to this way of existence so that other forms of life do not bother them and do not start wars. Nevertheless, for humanity, a planet completely covered with water turned out to be more than a curious subject of research. The main character is the head of a scientific group for the study of extraterrestrial forms of civilization.

item.title: Wild Bastards
item.description: Game Description InWild Bastards you’ll find yourself in the captain’s chair of a ragtag spaceship filled with the galaxy’s most notorious criminals. Think space pirates with a penchant for trouble. This isn’t your grandpa’s space opera, but a roguelike shooter where every decision can mean the difference between exploding into stardom or becoming cosmic dust. The missions are spread across a series of tactical campaigns, each of which is an adventure.

item.title: I Am Your Beast
item.description: Game Description I Am Your Beast is not your average shooter. This narrative-driven game throws you headlong into a brutal conflict with the shadowy organization you once worked for. You play as Alphonse Harding, a former operative who has been lured back into the world of underground warfare. Survival and thinking quickly are key. You’ll have to navigate treacherous terrain, dodging and fighting enemies in a high-stakes chase. Forget about going with guns at the ready.

item.title: Arcane Blast
item.description: Game Description InArcane Blast you’ll find yourself wearing the fur boots of Adrian, a cat mage on a mission. This roguelike adventure throws you into a chaotic world filled with spells, enemies, and the constant threat of a cat’s life. Do you think you can handle it? This isn’t your average walk in the park, unless that park is filled with evil goblins and fire-breathing lizards. It’s all about reflexes here.

item.title: Utopia Must Fall
item.description: Game Description Utopia Must Fall is a basic defense arcade shooter where gamers take on the role of humanity’s last line of defense against an alien invasion. The action takes place in a post-apocalyptic metropolis, and players will have to defend the city from relentless waves of alien aggressors. The gameplay of Utopia Must Fall is based on strategic resource management and quick decision making. Gamers must carefully manage their resources to upgrade their defenses and purchase new weapons, ensuring they are properly prepared for the challenges ahead.

item.title: Zero Hour
item.description: Game Description Zero Hour is a multiplayer tactical first-person shooter with realistic game mechanics that replicate the behavior of real special forces units in anti-terrorist operations. The setting for the action is criminal Bangladesh, where banditry is at a high level and is not going to give up ground to law enforcement officers. The locations where clashes between groups of terrorists and special forces occur are made using real scale, which greatly helps the atmosphere and involves gamers in the gameplay.

item.title: Smells Like a Mushroom
item.description: Game Description Smells Like a Mushroom is a sci-fi third-person shooter that takes gamers on a journey through the Milky Way. At the center is an invasion of creatures known as Magic Mushrooms. Users take on the role of Carrotado, a brave character tasked with preventing disaster. The gameplay includes platformer and shooter mechanics, and missions take place on various planets in the solar system. Smells Like a Mushroom’s narrative is driven by an absurd story and features both single-player and co-op modes.

item.title: Hit of Chernobyl
item.description: Game Description Hit of Chernobyl immerses users in a post-apocalyptic environment where survival is of paramount importance. Finding themselves in an area contaminated by an unspecified disaster, gamers take on the role of an adventurer. He must navigate a landscape full of dangers, not only from the environment, but also from other characters. The world is populated by marauders, journalists and thrill seekers, each with their own motives. Finding unique artifacts becomes the main task, requiring users to overcome a landscape replete with difficulties.

item.title: The Moon 2044
item.description: Game Description The Moon 2044 takes place in a secret research facility on the Moon, where gamers take on the role of a genetically modified commando codenamed XV-11. The mission is to retrieve priceless samples from the depths of a lunar base that has fallen into darkness and is now overrun by hostile creatures. The facility, originally intended for experimental cancer research, hides many dark secrets that users will have to uncover.

item.title: Kamikaze Lasplanes
item.description: Game Description Kamikaze Lassplanes is a visual novel that combines the plot of a novel with the action of a shoot-‘em-up game. Set in a steampunk world, the dramatic storyline involves two powerful weapons, Lassplanes, and two girls who become them. Gamers navigate a war-torn kingdom and make choices that affect not only the fate of the kingdom, but also their own hearts. The project introduces Alba Trosset and Hannah Brandenburg, two girls who transform into deadly warplanes.

item.title: Akimbot
item.description: Game Description Akimbot throws you into a metal menagerie! Teaming up rogue robot Exe with unexpected partner Shipset, this game throws down the galactic gauntlet. Imagine: you are fighting your way through hordes of robotic enemies, spaceships at the ready, and all this in order to stop a universal catastrophe. Fasten your seat belts, because this is not an easy ride. Akimbot isn’t all button-mashing chaos. It’s a strategic dance with enemies to dodge and outwit in every level.

item.title: Squirrel with a Gun
item.description: Game Description Squirrel with a Gun offers a unique experience. Users control a squirrel armed with a gun. Target? Collect golden acorns in a secret underground vault. The squirrel that haunts the neighbors becomes a hero. Gamers move through a sandbox filled with puzzles and enemies. The facility serves as a playground for chaos. To survive, the squirrel uses weapons, claws and teeth. The gameplay combines shooting and platforming. Users collect golden acorns - a squirrel’s obsession.

item.title: PROTOCOL 11 - Episode 1
item.description: Game Description PROTOCOL 11 - Episode 1 is a journey through many worlds as Phil goes on a quest for justice. This is an exciting adventure in which gamers must return what was stolen by a strange race of invaders. The story touches on themes of friendship, love and the essence of humanity. Users mine resources, fight enemies and choose between direct combat and stealth. Gameplay involves jumping on platforms, shooting, and solving puzzles.

item.title: Nova Drift
item.description: Game Description Nova Drift is a top-down action RPG adventure. The gamer has the opportunity to test his strength in piloting a space fighter, forced to fight enemies that are superior in numbers and firepower. The spaceship uses unusual technologies; it is created using biomechanics, which means that it seems to be alive and is constantly changing both in appearance and in terms of available weapons. Thanks to the addition of artificial intelligence trained in procedural random generation, the developers from a small indie formation were able to achieve almost endless replayability.

item.title: Pih
item.description: Game Description In Pih, the main goal is to clear locations by collecting all available food. Players progress through each level while avoiding hostile pigs as their main opponents. The project contains 64 different stages, thematically grouped into four seasons. Each seasonal block ends with a battle with one of four bosses, marking a clear progression in the playthrough structure. Pih’s concept prioritizes continuous gameplay, eschewing narrative elements like story or cutscenes.

item.title: Into the Radius 2
item.description: Game Description Into the Radius 2 throws users headlong into a chilling world. Whether you prefer solo exploration or thrilling squad adventures, Radius promises danger and secrets in equal measure. A project that will allow gamers to experience the disturbing atmosphere first hand. Forget about fancy graphics and pomposity. Into the Radius 2 boils it down to the bare bones of survival. Radius himself is a character, a mysterious and hostile force dictating your every move.

item.title: Crime Boss: Rockay City
item.description: Game Description Crime Boss: Rockay City throws you headlong into the dark underbelly of a crime-infested city. You are not some petty bandit, you are a crime boss hungry for power. Clever heists, tense decisions and outsmart everyone. The single-player campaign is your personal rise to glory. Every step you take - selecting a team, scouting an establishment, planning an escape - determines your path to the top of the criminal food chain.

item.title: Bodycam
item.description: Game Description Bodycam throws you headlong into a hyper-realistic multiplayer battlefield. Powered by Unreal Engine 5, this all-new shooter promises a next-gen experience that will redefine your expectations. Teamwork is key here. Every bullet counts, and the victory or defeat of your squad depends on your every decision. Forget playing Rambo. Bodycam requires strategic thinking and coordinated attacks. Team up with your teammates, map out a plan of action, and use your arsenal to outmaneuver your opponents.

item.title: Knights Within
item.description: Game Description Knights Within takes players to a post-apocalyptic world where humanity is on the brink of extinction. This third-person shooter/slasher hybrid pits you against relentless hordes of Wraiths as the fate of humanity hangs in the balance. You’ll find yourself knee-deep in procedurally generated missions, each of which is a dance with death. As you progress, both you and your otherworldly enemies receive randomized modifiers that increase the chaos factor and force you to be on your guard.

item.title: Outpost: Infinity Siege
item.description: Game Description Outpost: Infinity Siege is a fun sci-fi first-person shooter with elements of base building and tower defense. You command the Mobile Outpost and go with the Protoslug Cannon to deeply explore the forbidden zone of Cygnet, where many dangers await you. Collect unique weapon units and strengthen the firepower of the outpost that is fighting with you. This game combines elements of TD, FPS and RTS at the same time, making the gameplay incredibly exciting.

item.title: Midnight Ghost Hunt
item.description: Game Description Midnight Ghost Hunt is a creepy version of hide and seek in which players will have to catch ghosts or, on the contrary, drive away people who disturbed the peace of the spirits. 4v4 confrontation takes place between friends or random users. The main task of the hunters is to catch all the evil spirits with the help of their equipment, and the ghosts are to kill all living things by any means.

item.title: STAR WARS: Battlefront Classic Collection
item.description: Game Description STAR WARS: Battlefront Classic Collection brings back the beloved online shooters, remastered for modern consoles and PC. Players can now relive classic battles from the Star Wars galaxy, both online and offline, in this new collection. The collection includes the original game, as well as a bonus map: Jabba’s Palace. The second game, Battlefront 2, includes four bonus cards and two bonus heroes: Asajj Ventress and Kit Fisto.

item.title: Contra: Operation Galuga
item.description: Game Description Contra: Operation Galuga, the latest installment in the legendary Contra series, delivers a nostalgic adrenaline rush for fans and newcomers alike. This run-and-gun reimagining of the classic ’80s action film offers a new take on the iconic franchise. Players embark on a high-octane adventure as elite Contra commandos Bill Riser and Lance Bean. Their task is to prevent the Red Falcon terrorist group from seizing the Galuga Islands near New Zealand.

item.title: Barbotine
item.description: Game Description Barbotine is an experimental horror, the plot of which tells the story of the creepy seven-day transformation of the protagonist. After an unfortunate incident at a party, the hero falls ill and his body begins to undergo grotesque changes. In parallel with the physical mutations, the surrounding reality is also distorted: the familiar apartment becomes an increasingly strange and hostile place every day. Surreal visual images and a disturbing atmosphere plunge you into a state of increasing anxiety, making you feel alienated from your own body and the world around you.

item.title: Suicide Squad: Kill the Justice League
item.description: Game Description Suicide Squad: Kill the Justice League is perfect for all fans of the DC universe who want to look at familiar heroes from a new angle. Now the roles have been changed, superheroes have become a danger to the local population, and a villainous squad led by the crazy Harley Quinn will have to save her. Loud explosions, massive destruction and mild madness reign in the city of Metropolis.

item.title: Winter Memories
item.description: Game Description Winter Memories invites players to once again join Yui, Rio and Miyuki, the trio who created unforgettable summer moments just six months ago. As the seasons change and the snow melts, a new chapter opens in your story. Rediscover a serene coastal village and reconnect with loved ones during this cold season. The past gives rise to the present, but what new experiences await you this winter? Winter Memories is the sequel to the 2020 game Summer Memories, developed by Dojin Otome.

item.title: Ready or Not
item.description: Game Description Ready or Not is a tactical shooter that positions itself as a special forces simulator. The project is designed for fans of SWAT 4. The creators tried to focus on realism and cruelty. The game has single player, co-op and PvP. The main gameplay consists of conducting a special operation within the campaign or individual missions. Before you begin, you need to listen to the briefing, study the map of the building, decide on points for the assault and select equipment.

item.title: Arizona Sunshine 2
item.description: Game Description Arizona Sunshine 2, the anticipated sequel to the VR sensation, is set to deliver a whirlwind of blood, guts and laughter. As you set foot in the post-apocalyptic landscape of Arizona, the undead, affectionately known as Freds, lurk around every corner and resources are in short supply. To navigate this world, you will have to test your wits and skill while fighting hordes of zombies. But don’t be afraid, because you won’t be wandering the wasteland alone.

item.title: Arma Reforger
item.description: Game Description Arma Reforger is an action game that places great emphasis on the realism of what is happening and allows you to fight on a huge territory of 51 square kilometers. The action takes place during the Cold War. Players can create their own unique scenarios in Game Master mode. The shooter allows you to return to Everon - a microstate with Cold War Assault. Essentially, Arma Reforger acts as a modifiable platform, inviting participants to create their own stories and combat scenarios.

item.title: Redgar: The Space Viking
item.description: Game Description Redgar: The Space Viking places the player in a setting that combines elements from different time periods. The character navigates castle-like starships and neon fortresses from above. This universe is an alternate history where futuristic technology and medieval aesthetics coexist. The action takes place over a series of levels, including spaceship corridors and dungeons. The main activity is to navigate these locations and confront hostile inhabitants. Combat encounters in Redgar: The Space Viking offer straightforward method choices.

item.title: Executive Assault 2
item.description: Game Description Executive Assault 2 is an ambitious blend of first-person shooter and real-time strategy genres, where you build and maintain a vast base on the planet you are trying to conquer. Design and deploy your robotic troops wisely and manage available resources wisely to achieve victory. Visually the game looks much better; with shiny surfaces and a sleek new UI design, it’s certainly not cutting-edge graphics, but at least the series doesn’t look noticeably dated now.

item.title: Stop Dead
item.description: Game Description Stop Dead takes you to a future where urban landscapes are spreading across the planet and artificial intelligence is becoming ubiquitous. In this world, you will find yourself embroiled in the dark plots of a rogue AI bent on destroying its creators. Your job as a player is to become a disruptive and powerful force against the AI, with a unique set of abilities to help you counter it.

item.title: Super Buff HD
item.description: Game Description Super Buff HD is a high-octane shooter that plunges you into a world of absurdity, where battles with bizarre bosses await. The player will have to overcome a tower with sculpted biceps, crush a sword-wielding garbage can titan, or turn a mushroom king into mince with a belly-fall attack. To combat this madness, an arsenal is available, including a rotating potato cannon with basketball bombs and a hammer that invariably returns to the hands after a throw.

item.title: Sunkenland
item.description: Game Description Sunkenland is a fun adventure game that offers a unique take on the survival genre. The game immerses us in the world of the water element, which is both beautiful and dangerous. It involves mining resources, crafting items, building bases, trading and fighting pirates to survive in an aquatic environment plagued by hunger and violence. The game features a variety of locations such as sunken cities, atolls, floating bases and abandoned structures.

item.title: Retchid
item.description: Game Description In Retchid, players take on the role of a TEC engineer from Earth who must retrieve important classified data from a TEC mine on Titan. Upon arrival on Titan, the shocking realization comes that the object has fallen victim to interdimensional invaders. The gameplay centers on fighting these otherworldly creatures in a rich first-person shooter atmosphere intertwined with elements of cosmic horror and hints of Mesoamerican themes. The game seamlessly combines intense, tight combat with elements of exploration and light puzzle solving to create a methodically paced adventure.

item.title: Pixel Ripped 1978: An Atari Adventure
item.description: Game Description Pixel Ripped 1978: An Atari Adventure is a virtual adventure, the plot of which is built around the confrontation between two heroines and the villain Cyblin Lord. The narrative is split between two realities. In one of them, the protagonist is Dot, a character in the in-game world, and in the other, her creator named Bug, an Atari employee. The antagonist interferes with Bug’s past, trying to change her creative plans and prevent the creation of a happy universe for Dot.

item.title: KILLBUG
item.description: Game Description KILLBUG offers a unique and intense gaming experience that sets it apart from typical shooters. You take on the role of the fearsome Killbug, an insectoid creature that has faced exile and relentless persecution from its former kin. Armed with a deadly blade and an SMG pistol, you must fight your way through a series of unforgiving hordes of insects, from beetles to spiders and even a colossal maggot monster.

item.title: Meet Your Maker
item.description: Game Description Meet Your Maker invites you to plunge into a post-apocalyptic world, where each level is created by gamers themselves. You have to fight both alone and in pairs with a friend, building cunning labyrinths of terrible traps and guards at your bases in order to protect the most valuable thing - genetic material. As Guardian of the Chimera, a living experiment created to save life on Earth, you must capture other players' bases and extract even more material from them.

item.title: Crab Champions
item.description: Game Description Crab Champions is one of those projects where the gamer is given control of an extraordinary hero. As you can guess from the name, the characters of the game are crabs. The setting is tropical islands - the player will be surrounded by palm trees, sand, ocean, stones and exotic animals. And also other crabs, armed to the teeth. Crab Champions can be played in three different modes: Co-op.

item.title: Plains of Pain
item.description: Game Description Plains of Pain is a dark, post-apocalyptic multiplayer action game that takes you into a world of survival where hope has faded and all that remains is the ultimate end of days. This is no ordinary game - it’s a journey into a sun-scorched dystopian world that will push you to the brink of your sanity. The backstory is chillingly real. When the planet was engulfed by monstrous solar flares, Earth’s wealthiest people fled Earth as part of a secret government initiative, leaving the remaining population to fend for itself.

item.title: Dread Templar
item.description: Game Description Dread Templar may be suitable for those who are nostalgic for the old first-person shooters from the late nineties and early two thousand. There is blood and meat in the game. In this retro FPS, the player controls the Dread Templar. He fights demons and undead. The hero can carry with him an entire arsenal of weapons and a large supply of ammunition for them. There is a bow, a double-barreled sawn-off shotgun, a shotgun, a rocket launcher, a grenade launcher, and a revolver.

item.title: Warhammer 40,000: Darktide
item.description: Game Description Warhammer 40,000: Darktide is a co-op first-person shooter. Events take place in the huge city of Tertium on the planet Atom Prime. The cult of insane heretics Admonition is trying to capture him. Four heroes, together with the forces of the Inquisition, must resist Chaos and stop the bloodthirsty horde of the living dead and save the inhabitants from extermination. Since this is a classic co-op shooter, the gameplay is primarily focused on shooting and killing demonic enemies using melee weapons.

item.title: SIGNALIS
item.description: Game Description The space horror filmSIGNALIS is made in the style of anime. The indie project is a representative of the old-school survival horror genre. We play as a girl named Elster. She wakes up in a pressure chamber on a ship where something terrible happened. The main character is a Replica - a kind of android analogue. She periodically sees visions of others and picks up strange radio signals.

item.title: USAC: Code Breach
item.description: Game Description USAC: Code Breach is a unique co-op experience based on the French cyberpunk universe. You and your partner will have to investigate the sudden shutdown of a scientific center. The protagonist will have to act in a difficult situation, where every step can lead to death. It’s the middle of the 21st century - the world is going through big changes. The climate and energy crisis is being felt around the world.

item.title: Void Scrappers
item.description: Game Description Void Scrappers will tell about the eternal confrontation between humanity and aggressive aliens. According to the tradition of the science fiction genre, events take place in a future world in which people have achieved a high level of scientific and technological progress, which allowed them to explore the far frontiers of space. Soon they encountered other intelligent alien races and entered into a bloody war with one of them.

item.title: CULTIC
item.description: Game Description Death inCULTIC is the beginning of a mysterious path, so you shouldn’t be afraid of it. The player will have to muster up the courage to fight through hordes of perverted cultists in order to gain the upper hand in this battle. As the character progresses, he encounters hundreds of NPCs with completely frozen minds, who are guided by blind faith in their ideals. The cultists are further corrupted by an immortal and invisible entity that seeks sole domination of the world.

item.title: NeverAwake
item.description: Game Description NeverAwake is a 2D side-scrolling action platformer with beautiful hand-drawn graphics about a girl named Rem. She is still a child of 10 years old and suffers from regular nightmares in which she strives to conquer everything that brought her resentment and pain in real life. Her opponents are not the classic monsters from banal dreams, but those who were somehow able to damage her psyche. These are school friends and just classmates, dentists who hurt when they pulled out teeth and even yard dogs that try to bite her every morning when she goes to school.

item.title: HYPER DEMON
item.description: Game Description HYPER DEMON is a minimalist and experimental first-person shooter. It stands out for its visual style. It has very fast and dynamic gameplay. Here you can make jerks, slide, perform regular jumps and something like rocket jumps. There are more than a dozen techniques in total. You can master all these mechanics through training. The protagonist shoots daggers at demonic creatures from his outstretched hand. He is also capable of using consumable gems.

item.title: Metal: Hellsinger
item.description: Game Description In the hellish shooter Metal: Hellsinger, you need to destroy crowds of enemies in time with the music. Half human, half demon, the main character travels to the most terrible places of the underworld in search of revenge. There, hordes of demons, their lords and the legendary Scarlet Judge are waiting for him. On his bloody path he will be accompanied by heavy metal sounds and a varied arsenal of devilish weapons.

item.title: Sentry City
