item.description: Game Description Sentry City, a cyberpunk adventure, immerses gamers in a dystopian future where an evil AI is destroying social order. Taking on the role of a resourceful hacker, the player races through the metropolis on a motorcycle, infiltrating various areas of the city, each of which represents a separate treacherous landscape. Dexterity and quick reflexes are crucial as opponents require precision shooting, intricate puzzles require solving, and formidable AI guardians await confrontation.

item.title: Neon Blight
item.description: Game Description Neon Blight is an isometric metroidvania in a cyberpunk setting in which you will manage your own underground weapons store. When collecting unique weapons, you need to sell them at a high price. The game features a huge number of locations. The battles will take place in the scenery of the metropolis of the future, in dense forests, warehouses of large corporations, etc. Most of Neon Blight’s elements are procedurally generated, changing the placement of items and some location details.

item.title: Neon White
item.description: Game Description Neon White is a first-person adventure platformer with card game elements. The gameplay stands out for its incredible dynamics and speed. It is necessary to quickly react to situations and the environment, because enemies, traps, obstacles and other dangers await you at every turn. Events develop behind the pearly gates of Paradise. The task in the game is simple and trivial - you need to destroy all the demons in Heaven.

item.title: Soda Crisis
item.description: Game Description Soda Crisis is an incredibly colorful and dynamic action game with runner elements in which the player will have to explore levels and destroy all enemies along the way using advanced weapons. The plot here is not particularly deep and is revealed only superficially, since the gameplay is mainly aimed at mild madness and constant shootings. Enemies attack from all sides, including from the air, so in order not to fall under their bullets, you need to constantly be on the move.

item.title: Shotgun King: The Final Checkmate
item.description: Game Description Shotgun King: The Final Checkmate is an alternate version of chess with elements of classic roguelikes. Users will have to go on action missions, controlling a selected figure with a royal shotgun. The main task for the protagonist will be the destruction of enemy objects on a field designed in the form of a standard chessboard. Players have to destroy the white pieces on behalf of the Black King, who has prepared firearms.

item.title: Hidden Deep
item.description: Game Description Hidden Deep is a sci-fi thriller with shooter and puzzle elements. The scene of action is an oceanic underwater base located at a depth of 1.6 kilometers. The single-player campaign, which takes 20 hours to complete, begins with the recording of anomalous activity on the territory of the research laboratory. A group of rescuers was sent to reconnaissance of the situation and stayed there for more than a year, after which contact with them was interrupted.

item.title: Mirror 2: Project X
item.description: Game Description Mirror 2: Project X follows the adventures of Dinkudin Naoto, who collaborates with the FBI (Federal Bureau of Research and Conservation). The hero searches for mystical manifestations and otherworldly creatures that sometimes appear in the world. The plot begins with a story with a Demon that infects the body of one of the victims. During the proceedings and investigation of the case, the protagonist will find out the motivations and goals of the creatures in order to make a choice to support or destroy the monster.

item.title: DeadPoly
item.description: Game Description The DeadPoly universe has undergone colossal changes that have turned the lives of humanity upside down. A disaster occurred due to problems in the laboratory, where scientists did not keep track of the spread of the terrible virus. The planet gradually began to become infected, and people mutated into the walking dead, aggressively opposed to any other forms of life. The user takes control of a character who is destined to find himself in a brutal post-apocalyptic environment, where many factors besides creatures pose danger.

item.title: Black One Blood Brothers
item.description: Game Description Black One Blood Brothers is a full-fledged immersion in combat operations, where users will take control of a special forces squad. The game is made in the genre of tactical sandbox shooter, designed for one player. Gameplay mechanics are made in the style of the Rainbow six and Ghost Recon projects. Users will perform secret missions (JSO), where the protagonist has to move from a first-person perspective, taking on the role of a French naval officer serving in the Marine Corps.

item.title: Perfect Heist 2
item.description: Game Description The dynamic adventures in Perfect Heist 2 allow you to feel the atmosphere of a team of robbers who are hoping to commit the last global robbery and go to the bottom. Players will take control of the protagonist, who will participate in a dangerous operation, where they need to thoughtfully and harmoniously carry out certain actions with a group of partners. You have to quietly make your way through traps and police barricades, hoping to wait for the perfect moment and knock out one of the bank employees so that you can use the clothes as a disguise.

item.title: Battlefield 2042
item.description: Game Description Battlefield 2042 is a tactical action game, the main conflict of which is the confrontation between Russia and the United States in the world of the near future. Humanity has exhausted almost all of the Earth’s resources. Now the mighty superpowers have entered the race for the planet’s last fossils. Germany lost ground and the EU collapsed. The world is in the midst of a Second Great Depression. The gameplay is a first-person shooter.

item.title: Urge
item.description: Game Description Urge is an exciting and addictive game that immerses you in a post-apocalyptic environment where users take on the role of a car accident survivor. The plot revolves around a mysterious drug called fog that has corrupted the world. This substance reacts to actions, shaping the environment and influencing the behavior of enemies encountered. The game mechanics offer a fun experience while allowing you to make strategic choices. Making short work of enemies by shooting them in the head may seem like a viable option, but it comes with consequences.

item.title: MADNESS: Project Nexus
item.description: Game Description MADNESS: Project Nexus is a three-dimensional dynamic shooter with a side view, as well as a huge number of opponents and violence that happens on the monitor screen. The arcade controls are easy to remember, allowing you to quickly start enjoying the gameplay. This project from indie developers is a driving mixture of beat’em’up and slasher using not only melee weapons, but also firearms with different damage. The main feature of the gameplay is the ability to play cooperatively on one personal computer.

item.title: World War Z: Aftermath
item.description: Game Description World War Z: Aftermath is a cross-platform zombie shooter with an emphasis on co-op, where the player participates in the Apocalypse. Here it is proposed to team up with three other participants, or try alone to resist the crowd of the walking dead in a story campaign, operating across the globe on lands destroyed by the enemy. In the continuation of World War Z, the gamer goes through new story missions, during which old, already well-known heroes are present.

item.title: Mecha Knights: Nightmare
item.description: Game Description Mecha Knights: Nightmare takes place in the near future. Here in 2049, with the peak of another Cold War between NATO and the Russian-Chinese alliance, the conflict is about to go global. But suddenly, humanity’s worst nightmare comes - demonic creatures begin to appear out of nowhere, wreaking havoc on Earth. As a young American pilot, Ethan, who finds himself at the epicenter of what is happening, the user will have to fight the creatures using a mechanized military development called “Mobile Armor”.

item.title: Agent Intercept
item.description: Game Description Agent Intercept is a dynamic arcade game full of exciting chases, intrigue, explosions and destruction. As the main character, you need to stop the crime syndicate CLAWS. They are developing a powerful transforming machine that is capable of destroying the entire world. You need to drive a car called Scepter. Transport is equipped with the latest gadgets and spy technologies. Racing along the tracks, you need to drift, jump on springboards, cut through air and water, and also try to elude death.

item.title: Cruelty Squad
item.description: Game Description Cruelty Squad is an immersive simulator that includes elements of stealth and first-person shooter. You will need to penetrate the depths of a high-tech corporation to stop its atrocities. A huge arsenal of weapons is available, including shotguns, darts, pistols, launchers and much more. The difficulty increases with each new stage. It is necessary to take part in intense firefights with a huge number of different enemies. It is possible to emerge victorious from a fight without death.

item.title: DOOMBRINGER
item.description: Game Description DOOMBRINGER is an uncompromising arena shooter, the gameplay formula of which is built on rapid movement, merciless destruction of enemies and masterful use of the arsenal. Confrontation with opponents is devoid of an element of chance, since each attack is predictable and can be prevented, which transfers all responsibility for survival to the skill of the gamer himself. The visual style refers to the classics of the genre, and the movement system with an emphasis on expressive jumping and jumping allows you to navigate the well-designed maps as efficiently as possible.

item.title: Astrodogs
item.description: Game Description Astrodogs is an arcade action game where space dogs take part in battles. The main characters will have to save the galaxy from the WOOFER company, which controls all territories and planets. Enemy dogs attack civilians, deceive ordinary workers and commit other wrong acts, because of which the ruin of the entire civilization is on the verge. The usual antics of the suspicious organization weren’t too bad until they started attacking every planet in the solar system.

item.title: pureya
item.description: Game Description pureya is a collection of pixel mini-games lasting 10 seconds. The user will go through hundreds of modes with original obstacles and goals. The location, missions and traps will change constantly. Somewhere you have to travel on a spaceship and fly around objects, or fight enemies as a powerful knight. Each arcade is controlled using two buttons. The gameplay features 2 main modes: complete passage and change every 10 seconds.

item.title: ULTRAKILL
item.description: Game Description ULTRAKILL is a game inspired by classic and modern shooters. You will find yourself in a future where people have become extinct. Now the main thing on the planet has become machines whose fuel is blood. There was little valuable liquid left on the surface of the Earth, and so robots began to explore the underground world in search of living creatures. Game Features: Fight multiple enemies. Destroy the risen dead, demonic creatures and other profit seekers.

item.title: Risk of Rain 2
item.description: Game Description Risk of Rain 2 is a continuation of the classic online game, which has become better and more complex than the original. The player will challenge the cruel world alone or team up with friends to defeat hordes of monsters, collect the necessary relics and escape from the terrifying planet. With each new attempt, you will be able to better understand the behavior of your opponents and defeat them outright with your skills, even when they are outnumbered.

item.title: Crosshair X
item.description: Game Description The Crosshair X software application for gamers will allow you to freely customize your sight in any way for games focused on shooter gameplay mechanics, and gives the final answer to the question: “how to make a sight for Rasta or CS GO?” Players can choose one of the presented presets to apply it or create their own based on it. The project has the ability to make the desired skin and size for the cursor from scratch, using a flexible editor with a settings window.

item.title: Deep Rock Galactic
item.description: Game Description Deep Rock Galactic is a co-op shooter with fast-paced gameplay in which you will fight with other users against alien monsters. The game is made in a sci-fi style and has procedurally generated levels in which you will fight. The mission can be completed by 1 to 4 players. Act as one. Dig, explore the area and shoot with enemies waiting for you in huge numbers around every corner.

item.title: GTA 4
item.description: Game Description GTA 4 became a revolutionary, breakthrough game in the series of criminal action games with a conditionally open world and almost complete freedom of action. It is not only technically and plot-wise different from its predecessors, but also sets a new standard of quality for all representatives of this and other genres. It is worth noting that the concept of GTA has gone far beyond the scope of this franchise, and some mechanics from this series of games are used in projects from other studios.

item.title: Half-Life: Alyx
item.description: Game Description Half-Life: Alyx became the first AAA quality game in history for virtual reality devices, the passage of which can be enjoyed on a PC only with the help of an appropriate device, namely a VR headset from Steam and related gadgets. The plot is a spin-off, the events of which unfold in the interval between the actions of the first and second parts. The Black Mesa Incident allowed Alliance forces to gain a foothold on the planet, leaving the remaining humans trapped in the cities.

item.title: DOOM Eternal
item.description: Game Description DOOM Eternal, a first-person shooter, continues the campaign of DOOM (developed in 2016). Our hero is the Doom Slayer. He will kill mutants and monsters on the territory of Mars, the attached spaceship, its satellites and Earth. In many ways, the plot scenes are taken from the second part of the series. The main addition to the game was moving through the levels. If earlier we could move to the next level only after finishing it, then in the new part it will be possible to “climb” to another location where the events of the next level take place.

item.title: Black Mesa
item.description: Game Description Black Mesa is a remake of the cult shooter Half-Life, which at one time turned out to be a breakthrough in the world of video games and made the name of Valve. They worked on this project for eight whole years, during which the creators tried to transfer the old game to the new Source engine with varying success. As a result, they managed to achieve the desired effect and in May 2015 the game was released.

item.title: some convenience store
item.description: Game Description some some convenience store is a visual novel with a lot of sexual content related to naked female bodies, which quite often flash on the monitor screen. The user finds himself in a kind of dating simulator in an alternative reality, playing the role of a simple guy working as a half-time senior salesman in a small grocery store. The goal of the project from indie developers is to establish a relationship with a representative of the fair sex, choosing a companion to your liking from the proposed options and achieving her favor.

item.title: Red Dead Redemption 2
item.description: Game Description Red Dead Redemption 2 is a third-person shooter adventure game set in the Wild West in 1899. The action involves the Dutch Van Der Linde gang, which is being pursued by lawmen after a botched ferry robbery. The player will take control of Arthur Morgan, one of the gang members. Some time after the unsuccessful prank, the gang decides that it is time to retire and live the rest of their lives like ordinary people, not bandits.

item.title: Halo: The Master Chief Collection
item.description: Game Description Halo: The Master Chief Collection is a complete collection of the cult shooter series about the Master Chief. The collection includes all numbered games in the series that were released before Halo: Infinite. At the same time, the developers have improved the visual component of the game, providing 4k resolution and HDR support for modern monitors. The story tells of the confrontation between the United Nations Space Command and the religious alien alliance Covenant.

item.title: Dude Simulator 3
item.description: Game Description Dude Simulator 3 is a dude simulator that is characterized by absurdity and black humor. You play the role of a “friend” who is preparing for his friend’s birthday. The day begins with you buying him a gift. Now we need to deliver it, but my friend lives in another city. You are about to go on an adventure that promises many funny and exciting moments. Gameplay Dude Simulator 3 features an open world sandbox with a unique cubic visual style.

item.title: Quake II RTX
item.description: Game Description Quake II RTX offers a new look at the classic project. This became possible thanks to the introduction of RTX technology. So, now the usual corridors and battle arenas look completely new, the hero models have a more acceptable appearance, and the shot animations have become more spectacular. As for the gameplay component, Quake II RTX is no different from the original in this component. Users are transported to arenas where they fight each other in a certain number of rounds.

item.title: Insurgency: Sandstorm
item.description: Game Description Insurgency: Sandstorm is a sequel to a multiplayer shooter built on deathmatches in confined spaces, with the ability to use light vehicles. The game has been significantly improved and expanded. The key to victory lies only through well-coordinated teamwork. The action takes place in the Middle East, on the ruins of settlements and military bases. You need to carefully choose your weapon and explore the territory, because without caution and tactics you can quickly catch a bullet in the forehead.

item.title: DUSK
item.description: Game Description DUSK is a canonical first-person shooter created in a retro style. The plot is quite simple and clear - there is a small town called DUSK, in its vicinity ruins were discovered that have mystical properties. Many scientists and soldiers came here, studying strange objects and everyone gradually went crazy. They became possessed, and the government surrounded the entire area with a wall. A brave hero was found who entered the forbidden territory in search of these unique artifacts, but was captured by occultists and hung on hooks.

item.title: BATTLEFIELD 5
item.description: Game Description Battlefield 5 is a first-person shooter, the fifteenth game in the Battlefield series. Unlike previous games in the series, Battlefield 5 sacrifices historical accuracy for the sake of the player: weapon handling, for example, has been noticeably improved, making the game more like an arcade shooter. Most of the changes made to BFV are solid improvements over its predecessor. War Stories is a series of single-player missions introduced in Battlefield V, where the player is invited to become an eyewitness to tragic events.

item.title: Mirror
item.description: Game Description Mirror is a visual novel that perfectly combines erotic content, an RPG component, an interactive plot and battles in which you take a direct part. The whole game is built on the “three in a row” principle. In the casual combination of characters, you will only take part in the battle on the Match 3 battlefield. That is, you will win if you can score more points. The game features three heroines who will oppose you throughout the game.

item.title: Far Cry 5
item.description: Game Description Finally, the plot ofFar Cry 5 has reached America. Crazed fanatics unleashed their might on the state of Montana. A first-person shooter with action elements brings us to a reality in which even the movements of dogs will be more than real. The modernization of the shooter took several years, so the development studio warns us in advance that the game is based on religious motives. Age limit: 18+.

item.title: Stick Fight: The Game
item.description: Game Description Stick Fight: The Game is a multiplayer platformer with fighting game elements. Players control colorful people, overcoming obstacles and fighting each other. The main gameplay consists of moving, jumping and reacting quickly. On the path of the heroes there will be deadly obstacles that will take the lives of all those who hesitated even a little and did not react to the situation. Game features: from 2 to 4 players over a local or online network; physics-based combat system; about 100 well-developed and detailed locations; includes a level editor; various ranged and melee weapons; procedurally generated and contextual animations based on the system Totally Accurate Battle Simulator.

item.title: Star of Providence
item.description: Game Description Star of Providence is a vertical scroller, the actions of which take place in procedurally generated locations, where obstacles, traps and enemy locations are also randomly created. You will have to explore the huge abandoned Monolith complex to find the source of ancient power. Get new weapons, upgrade your shuttle and fight a huge number of enemies. Having descended into the depths of the underground complex, it is necessary not only to find the source of powerful power, but also to find fragments of one’s past.

item.title: Tom Clancy's Ghost Recon Wildlands
item.description: Game Description The open world of the new part -Tom Clancy’s Ghost Recon Wildlands - truly inspires what the developers tried to convict all players of. It must be said, but there is no plot in a third-person shooter. You independently write the story of your team, which is initially aimed at destroying the cartel that trades and produces drugs. But more on that later. First, it’s worth discussing the inner world of Tom Clancy’s Ghost Recon Wildlands.

item.title: theHunter: Call of the Wild
item.description: Game Description The Hunter’s Open World is now available intheHunter: Call of the Wild. This is not a simple hunter simulator, where we will have to climb trees and hide in the grass to kill the next deer, but a full-fledged world with smells, changing wind and weather; with the individual behavior of each animal that must be killed to complete the task. This is not a simple hunt, but a real one!

item.title: Resident Evil 7: Biohazard
item.description: Game Description Resident Evil 7: Biohazard is a survival horror game that continues the famous series of games, one of the founders of the genre. The release is timed to coincide with the twentieth anniversary of the universe. An option is available to play using a virtual reality helmet and control of special complete controllers from VR glasses. The seventh part was a return to the roots of the first games in the series, because, unlike parts 5 and 6, which were focused on action, shooting and the plot taking place in different parts of the world, this project has the main location in the form of a small estate of the Baker family, which gives the atmosphere is claustrophobic and increases the degree of fear.

item.title: Killing Floor 2
item.description: Game Description A cooperative first-person shooter in which there are only two modes - survival and battle in the territory. Killing Floor 2 does not have a plot, but there is sharp FPS on several maps, where each player chooses the desired role for himself - a zombie or a department fighting an epidemic. In addition to the fact that the gameplay differs on both sides of the barricades, players can buy additional weapons, make skins and show who can stand up best on the map.

item.title: Titanfall 2
item.description: Game Description Titanfall 2 is a first-person shooter in a fantasy future setting. Continuation of the first game, released in 2014. In this part, in addition to online battles, there is a single-player campaign about Jack Cooper, a soldier who does not have his own titanium, but wants to get it. At the center of the story is the conflict between the militia, assembled from the common people, and the giant corporation IMC.

item.title: Battlefield 1
item.description: Game Description Battlefield 1 is a first-person shooter in the setting of the First World War. The game is the 15th in the series of the same name. The plot is divided into five chapters and begins with a prologue. The story takes place in 1918 and is told from the perspective of tankman Daniel Edwards, who controls the Black Bass tank. Before the war, he was an ordinary driver, but now he has to break through the German line.

item.title: DOOM (2016)
item.description: Game Description DOOM 2016, unlike DOOM Ethernal, has less dynamics, but is more related to the horror genre. We can say that it began the evolution of the series towards speed and platforming, and it is considered closer in spirit to the series than its brother released in 2020. It was the first step towards a global rethinking of the franchise. The game takes place inside the corridors of a giant research complex.

item.title: Enter the Gungeon
item.description: Game Description InEnter the Gungeon you will remember such a genre as bullet hell or “hell of bullets”. The main characters explore the Gungeon and try to find a legendary artifact - a weapon that can kill the past. To do this, you need to fight your way through hordes of monsters and defeat formidable bosses. Loot, secrets, penny-pinching merchants and shopkeepers, new equipment and more loot - the recipe for a good game.

item.title: Hot Dogs, Horseshoes and Hand Grenades
item.description: Game Description The gameHot Dogs, Horseshoes and Hand Grenades can be called a full-fledged weapons simulator. You need to go to the training ground, which contains a huge selection of different firearms: pistols, machine guns, shotguns, rocket launchers, grenades, etc. You can use any available ammunition, training on targets and taking the highest positions on the leaderboard. Afterwards you can go and set off fireworks. Targets can be not only static within the walls of a gray pavilion, but also moving in open space.

item.title: Resident Evil 0 / biohazard 0 HD REMASTER
item.description: Game Description Resident Evil 0 / biohazard 0 HD REMASTER – third-person survival horror, re-released with new, higher-quality texture resolution and improved animation and lighting. A “Wesker Mode” with another playable character has also been added. The number zero in the title means that the story told in this part is a prequel to the first part of the legendary series, which spawned many projects in a single universe and created a real fashion for zombies and horror films with elements of survival.

item.title: Raiden Legacy - Steam Edition
item.description: Game Description Raiden Legacy is a collection of four arcade action games by Japanese game designer Kaihatsu Seibu. The games take place in 2090. Our planet was attacked by alien forces. The World Alliance decides to fight back and creates a special project called Raiden. You play as an experienced pilot who is the only hope for saving humanity. Arm yourself with powerful guns, board a battle shuttle and destroy a huge number of enemies.

item.title: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six Siege
item.description: Game Description A new installment in the first-person shooter,Tom Clancy’s Rainbow Six Siege is a game of multiplayer destruction. We will not just destroy the map to which we and our friends were sent, but we will build traps, plant a bomb, and all this at a distance of a bow shot. The technical equipment of the new part is made specifically so that you can blow up everything in the open location of each level.

item.title: Just Cause 3
item.description: Game Description Just Cause 3 is a continuation of the famous franchise about the adventures of a specially trained agent named Rico Rodriguez. This part of the series did not deviate from the style and genre of previous games in the universe where the mercenary nicknamed “Scorpio” lives. The end of the trilogy is made with the same driving action, open world, a large number of tricks and devices available in the protagonist’s arsenal, and an adventure plot in which the fate of an entire state will be at stake.

item.title: Metal Gear Solid 5: The Phantom Pain
item.description: Game Description Metal Gear Solid 5: The Phantom Pain is a continuation of the famous series of stealth shooters from the recognized master of game design and production Hideo Kojima. The plot taking place in this game becomes a prequel to the very first game in the universe - Metal Gear. It forms a complete picture with the prologue released a little earlier - Metal Gear Solid V: Ground Zeroes.

item.title: Duck Game
item.description: Game Description Duck Game is an action game developed by Landon Podbielski and published by Adult Swim Games. You can play alone or with friends online. Duck Game gives us both options. The game received extremely positive reviews from both professional critics and gamers, as well as from ordinary people. A simple 2D fighting game with multiplayer simply couldn’t get bad reviews. True, some are indignant about the name of the game because the name, according to some players, does not reflect anything.

item.title: Grand Theft Auto 5
item.description: Game Description GTA 5 has received dozens of awards for its open world, and almost the most expensive multi-platform project in history isGrand Theft Auto V. The story opens before us in the same fictional state - San Andreas, made 1 to 1 as Southern California. We play as three robber friends who have spent their entire adult lives stealing cars, robbing small shops and people on the street. One day someone decides to get involved in organized crime, which they have been fighting for the last 5 years.

item.title: Amazing Frog?
item.description: Game Description Amazing Frog? is an open-world adventure game where you play as a toad who wreaks havoc on the streets of the city. The gameplay is based on humor and the physical properties of bodies. The events will take place in the city of Swindon, UK. The metropolis is home to the main character, so he decides to turn a once quiet place into the center of madness and disaster.

item.title: BlazeRush
item.description: Game Description The creators of BlazeRush were clearly inspired by Blizzard’s ride-alongs that came out on consoles back in the 90s. Since that project ultimately did not reach the PC, its spiritual successor appeared a couple of decades later. The game also successfully played with the idea of ​​another racing hit of those years - “Micromachines” - in the form of a single screen for all participants in the race. The arcade action game features co-op for four people.

item.title: Metro 2033 Redux
item.description: Game Description Metro 2033 Redux is a first-person shooter with a deep story and horror elements. The developers questioned not the simple existence of people underground, but the relationships between them. Has the main threat always been with us, in people? In the world of the post-apocalypse, we play as a character named Artem. He grew up underground, in the Moscow metro. In 2013, the world was hit by the terrible consequences of the latest epidemic.

item.title: Arma 3
item.description: Game Description InArma 3 we regain our independence by playing as a neutral side of this war. Inside the universe of the third Arma - 2030. Key opponents are still fighting for independence in economic and commodity terms. Among the enemies, a new structural organization CSAT appears, acting as a military-political alliance. While the crisis rages in Europe, the United States is at odds with China in the Pacific. More than 400 square kilometers of gaming space, where the player, playing the role of a NATO peacekeeper, will save his group from real traitors who show themselves at the beginning of the story campaign.

item.title: Tomb Raider
item.description: Game Description Tomb Raider is a restart of the series telling about the adventures of Lara Croft. The ship on which the girl’s crew was sailing was wrecked. On the island she is captured and left tied in a cave. The adventurer frees herself from her bonds and goes to look for the crew members. The player can choose the difficulty, which affects the course of battles. A vast world opens up before the gamer, divided into several locations.

item.title: Far Cry 3
item.description: Game Description The first-person shooter -Far Cry 3 - will teach you how to survive in the wild conditions of the open world, more or less value relationships with good people, and show you what real madness is. The series rewarded us with enough action, showing that a huge arsenal of weapons is just part of what can be given to players in return for their desire to enjoy a completely open world and a good story.

item.title: Hotline Miami
item.description: Game Description Hotline Miami is a 2D top-down action game created by two incredibly hardworking and talented young people under the auspices of the same computer game development studio - Dennaton Games. The international release of this project took place in October 2012. The developers admitted that they took their inspiration from the Hollywood crime action films of the 80s. The game, as the name implies, takes place in the city of Miami, in the first half of the 80s.

item.title: Capsized
item.description: Game Description Capsized is an action platformer with 2D graphics, where the player will take control of a master of space travel and an experienced adventurer. The game was created under the strict guidance of programmer Lee Vermeulen and artist Jesse McGibney. The latter completely drew all the locations by hand. The plot begins with a terrible shipwreck on which the protagonist was traveling. The main character survives and awakens on an unknown planet where no one has ever been.

item.title: Left 4 Dead 2
item.description: Game Description InLeft 4 Dead 2 we have a choice between 4 characters. The coach is a massive African American; Nick is an avid gambler, a trickster and a master of theft; Rochelle is a black 29-year-old Depeche Mode fan and journalist; Ellis is a racing fan and car enthusiast. The cooperative first-person shooter captivated many players for several years, providing ample ground for exterminating zombies in 5 game campaigns, which take place in swamps, cities, caves and closed locations.

item.title: Left 4 Dead 1
item.description: Game Description The first part ofLeft 4 Dead has 6 campaigns, several levels in each. The history and chronology of the chapters are interconnected, which will prevent the gamer from getting confused in the plot. At the beginning of each area, characters will appear at a checkpoint, where they can pick up weapons and ammunition and set off on their further journey. The United States of America has been gripped by an unknown virus that turns people into terrible monsters with bouts of aggression and rage.

item.title: Half-Life 2: Episode Two
item.description: Game Description The open world of the newly releasedHalf-Life 2: Episode Two at one time created a stir all over the world. Openly moving with one goal - to deliver information about the Alliance to the Resistance base - was a shocking task that players rushed into one after another. In the first-person shooter, we will continue to play as Gordon Freeman with Alixa Vance. Long journeys in the game are accompanied by frequent changes of scenes: now we are fighting against mutants, now we are solving puzzles, now we are watching an interactive film about the characters’ journey and their conversations.

item.title: El Matador
item.description: Game Description El Matador is a game inspired by the mechanics of the famous Max Payne series. “El Matador” is a third-person shooter where the protagonist, Victor Corbet, is an agent of the Drug Enforcement Administration (DEA). He uses his “bullet time” time dilation skills to perform acrobatic jumps in all directions for spectacular, and most importantly, effective extermination of bandits. Also similar to the project from Remedy Interactive will be the fact that Victor uses dual weapons for both hands.

item.title: Serious Sam 2
item.description: Game Description The entire Serious Sam 2 - a first-person shooter with a lot of action - shows us the atmosphere of an absurd fight with many monsters, weapons and a huge number of bonuses scattered on each planet. Cool Sam is full of hope to kill Mental. Everyone in the universe knows that the antagonist is immortal, and in order to destroy him, make him vulnerable, you will have to collect the Medallion of Power.

item.title: Half-Life 2
item.description: Game Description The first-person shooter, which instantly became the voice of the generation -Half-Life 2 - gave players hope for the third part. The game has received so many awards that there is no point in describing them in the context of the description. The plot reveals to us the continuation of the first part. Gordon Freeman takes up his mount again, but now the graphics have become more realistic, there are more locations, and the plot is even deeper.

item.title: POSTAL 2
item.description: Game Description POSTAL 2 is a first-person shooter full of dark humor, references, blood and other hardcore stuff like desecrating graves or putting cats on a machine gun as a silencer. The plot develops in a strange town - Paradise. The main character of Postal 2 will be a character named Dude. He tries to live an ordinary life without doing anything illegal. At the beginning of the story, he gets a job at the computer game development office Running with Scissors.

item.title: Counter-Strike
item.description: Game Description Counter-strike is a legendary multiplayer shooter, the founder of one of the most popular series in the history of the gaming industry. The concept is simple but ingenious. Two teams - terrorists and special forces - are trying to destroy each other on the map. Terrorists have the ability to plant a bomb at one of the key points. and the counterterrorism department tries to predict which point the opponents will attack.

item.title: Half-Life (1998)
item.description: Game Description Half-Life (1998) - sci-fi shooter. One of the first games where the plot was completely presented using cutscenes in the engine. One of the main features of Half-Life was the artificial intelligence of enemies, which was striking in its elaboration. The story of Half-Life begins at the Black Mesa research facility in the mountains of New Mexico. Control takes place for the young physicist Gordon Freeman, who is researching anomalous materials.

item.title: Neuro
item.description: Game Description Neuro is a three-dimensional action game that gives the player the feeling of being inside a fictional world in the role of a psionicist who can use his abilities for combat purposes. The story told in this brainchild of the developers “Revolt Games” is a prequel to their other project called “Homeplanet”. The last missions of the single-player campaign develop in parallel with the start of their last game.

item.title: Road to Vostok
item.description: Game Description Road to Vostok is a journey into the heart of the exclusion zone located on the border between Finland and Russia, where every step could be your last. Survival here depends not on reaction speed, but on careful planning and preparation. The atmosphere of abandoned real locations permeates every element of the environment, making you constantly feel the tension and desolation of the post-apocalyptic world. Any mistake becomes fatal, and the price of a miscalculation is the irrevocable loss of everything achieved in a special zone with permanent death.

item.title: Selaco
item.description: Game Description Selaco is an action game that is primarily focused on plot and deep history, rather than shooting for fun. In many ways, it will focus on revealing the heroine and her personal conflicts that she will experience in critical situations. Many additional records scattered throughout the territory will help reveal new details about the structure of the world and its secrets. When the Earth fell, humanity could no longer remain on the surface due to severe pollution and radiation.

item.title: Stalker Gamma
item.description: Game Description Stalker Gamma is a large-scale modular build for Anomaly, the main goal of which is to provide a balanced survival experience in harsh environments. The foundation of the entire gameplay is a revised economic model, where merchants sell only limited supplies, and access to high-quality ammunition and special goods is only available to trusted customers. This approach makes it necessary to carefully plan each foray into the Zone. Progression in Stalker GAMMA is deliberately slowed down, which shifts the emphasis to thoughtful exploration of the world and increases the value of each find.

item.title: The Black Ice
item.description: Game Description The Black Ice is a sinister adventure in the heart of Antarctica, where chilling horror envelops the abandoned Vostok polar station. Players will take on the role of Agent Alexei, who arrives alone at a mysterious research facility after receiving a distress signal. An atmosphere of total loneliness and fear permeates every corridor, because all the personnel have disappeared without a trace, and communication with the outside world has been severed, leaving the hero alone with an inexplicable threat.
